Body:
responses.add(responses.GET, rest_url('bug', 1017315), body=json.dumps(
    bug_return), status=200, content_type='application/json',
    match_querystring=True)
bugzilla = Bugsy()
bug = bugzilla.get(1017315)
responses.reset()
responses.add(responses.GET,
    'https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/rest/bug/1017315', body=json.dumps(
    bug_return), status=200, content_type='application/json')
clone = Bug(bugsy=bugzilla, **bug.to_dict())
clone.status = 'NEW'
clone.update()
assert clone.id == 1017315
assert clone.status == 'RESOLVED'
responses.activate
